item.title: Vegetable and Vermicelli Soup
item.description: This soup will warm you up on chilly backpack nights and help you rehydrate after a long day on the trail. This soup is also the perfect appetizer for a multi-course backpack meal! Ingredients Â½ cup (125 ml) dry vermicelli, chopped in small pieces (or soup pasta) 5 tsp. (25 ml) chicken broth powder 3 tbsp. (45 ml) dried spinach 3 tbsp. (45 ml) dried carrots 3 tbsp. (45 ml) dried tomatoes 1 tbsp.
